```{asis, echo = {{covariate_results_knit}}, eval = {{covariate_results_knit}}, include = {{covariate_results_knit}}}
### Summarise the results from the covariate model
```

```{r, echo = {{covariate_results_knit}}, include = {{covariate_results_knit}}}
covariate_results(covariate_model)
```
```{r, echo = {{covariate_results_knit}}, include = {{covariate_results_knit}}}
knitr::kable(covariate_model$sumresults$summaries$statistics, row.names = TRUE, caption = "Empirical mean and standard deviation for each variable,
            plus standard error of the mean:")
```
```{r, echo = {{covariate_results_knit}}, include = {{covariate_results_knit}}}
knitr::kable(covariate_model$sumresults$summaries$quantiles, row.names = TRUE, caption = "Quantiles for each variable:")
```
